name: Adobe Flex SDK 4.0 (Release)
releaseNotes: Release Notes - Apache Flex - Version Adobe Flex SDK 4.0 (Release)

issues.title: [Customer] When the mxml component is instantiated using PopUpManager, creationPolicy is all works
